# GET /v1/appEvents/{id}/relationships/localizations | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ App Store Connect API ](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi)

- [ GET /v1/appEvents/{id}/relationships/localizations ](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-appEvents-_id_-relationships-localizations)

-  GET /v1/appEvents/{id}/relationships/localizations 

Web Service Endpoint# GET /v1/appEvents/{id}/relationships/localizations

App Store Connect API 3.6+## [URL](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-appEvents-_id_-relationships-localizations#url)



```
GET https://api.appstoreconnect.apple.com/v1/appEvents/{id}/relationships/localizations
```

## [Path Parameters](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-appEvents-_id_-relationships-localizations#path-parameters)

`id``string` (Required) 

## [Query Parameters](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-appEvents-_id_-relationships-localizations#query-parameters)

`limit``integer`

 Maximum: `200`## [Response Codes](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-appEvents-_id_-relationships-localizations#response-codes)

` 200 OK``[AppEventLocalizationsLinkagesResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/appeventlocalizationslinkagesresponse)`OK`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 400 Bad Request``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Bad Request`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 401 Unauthorized``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Unauthorized`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 404 Not Found``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Not Found`
